description: IConstraintLayout is a marker interface that indicates that a container supports ConstraintColumn class and ConstraintRow class within its layout. Application, Canvas, and Panel containers support ConstraintRow and ConstraintColumn classes. To utilize this type of constraint in these containers, set the layout property to "absolute" and create ConstraintColumn and ConstraintRow instances.

members.description: An Array of ConstraintColumn instances that partition this container. The ConstraintColumn instance at index 0 is the left-most column; indices increase from left to right.
An Array of ConstraintRow instances that partition this container. The ConstraintRow instance at index 0 is the top-most row; indices increase from top to bottom.
